entry.def: A conglomeration of things is a group of many different things, gathered together.

example.ex: ...a conglomeration of buildings, all tightly packed together.
...a conglomeration of peoples speaking different languages.
example.tran: 汇聚一地的南腔北调的民族

means.word_mean: 2. a sum total of many heterogenous things taken together
3. an occurrence combining miscellaneous things into a (more or less) rounded mass
